evidence.claim: GovStrive Solutions is HIPAA compliant and offers health tech integration services.
The company mentions using HL7 standards for interoperability in health data exchanges.
X12 transaction sets are referenced in their EDI capabilities.
They have a section detailing their approach to FHIR for modern health applications.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or API automation on their site.
